__e: I know a lot about your family's land.
He claims this is his mothers land.
Too late after he has run... into his son's domain.
Saved a few dollars, thinking of finding' myself a woman staking off a few acres of my own, when this come up.
Everything I have done, I have done for the safety of the Four Lands... and to protect you.
"Why would I cheat you," I said. "I got all the land and money I want."
To tell you that you have to leave the Castle grounds.
The land down there is not good for much else.
It was seen in the Middle Kingdom...

Even though I've known Lucy for years, and can see myself spending a life together with her, having children, walking the grounds of Tommy's Bahama-- a private island I'll eventually buy-- that's way in the future, man.
I see land, Springs, houses, and then there's you and me.
He will be master of these lands on my death.
So there is land to the east?
..there'll be sugarcane growing in the entire village.
I've got to be alive if you want to prove that the land is yours.
Look, from now on these lands are ours.
